Title: Sakhalin Energy delays LNG cargo tender amid record-high spot prices
Description: Sakhalin Energy has delayed plans to issue a tender to sell a strip of winter cargoes from its 10.8 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Sakhalin LNG plant in Russiaâ€™s Prigorodnoye port in the hope of capturing a higher transaction price as spot LNG prices show no signs of retreating from their all-time high levels.
Author: CK
